data_table.description: World Health Organization's Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) Coding for Medication, Offspring Cohort Exam 8. Data collected include ATC codes, chemical subgroup of drugs, medication name and use.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: SHARE ID Number

variable.name: atc_cod2
variable.description: ATC code for second drug in compound

variable.name: system2
variable.description: Description/Label for anatomical main group - second drug in compound
variable.comment: BLANK= not coded or single drug

variable.name: ther_gp2
variable.description: Description/Label for therapeutic subgroup - second drug in compound

variable.name: phrm_gp2
variable.description: Description/Label for pharmacological subgroup - second drug in compound

variable.name: chem_gp2
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical subgroup - second drug in compound

variable.name: chem_nm2
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical substance - second drug in compound

variable.name: atc_cod1
variable.description: ATC code for medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: system1
variable.description: Description/Label for anatomical main group - medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: ther_gp1
variable.description: Description/Label for therapeutic subgroup - medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: phrm_gp1
variable.description: Description/Label for pharmacological subgroup - medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: chem_gp1
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical subgroup - medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: chem_nm1
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical substance - medication or first drug in compound

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Framingham Cohort Identifier

variable.name: MEDNAME
variable.description: Medication name

variable.name: MEDSTREN
variable.description: Medication strength

variable.name: MEDNUM
variable.description: Number taken for a given period (medper)

variable.name: MEDPER
variable.description: Period range

variable.name: MEDPRN
variable.description: Medication taken as needed

variable.name: atc_cod3
variable.description: ATC code for third drug in compound

variable.name: atc_cod4
variable.description: ATC code for fourth drug in compound

variable.name: system3
variable.description: Description/Label for anatomical main group - third drug in compound

variable.name: ther_gp3
variable.description: Description/Label for therapeutic subgroup - third drug in compound

variable.name: phrm_gp3
variable.description: Description/Label for pharmacological subgroup - third drug in compound

variable.name: chem_gp3
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical subgroup - third drug in compound

variable.name: chem_nm3
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical substance - third drug in compound

variable.name: system4
variable.description: Description/Label for anatomical main group - fourth drug in compound

variable.name: ther_gp4
variable.description: Description/Label for therapeutic subgroup - fourth drug in compoud

variable.name: phrm_gp4
variable.description: Description/Label for pharmacological subgroup - fourth drug in compound

variable.name: chem_gp4
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical subgroup - fourth drug in compound

variable.name: chem_nm4
variable.description: Description/Label for chemical substance - fourth drug in compound
